properties.name: app.scraping.amazon-email
properties.description: Amazon ログイン用メールアドレス（既定 空文字）

properties.name: app.scraping.amazon-email
properties.description: Amazon login email/username.

properties.name: app.scraping.amazon-password
properties.description: Amazon ログインパスワード（既定 空文字）

properties.name: app.scraping.amazon-password
properties.description: Amazon login password.

properties.name: app.scraping.base-url
properties.description: Amazon ベース URL（既定 https://www.amazon.co.jp）

properties.name: app.scraping.channel
properties.description: Playwright チャネル（chrome/msedge 等）。空欄ならランタイムの既定値を使用。

properties.name: app.scraping.channel
properties.description: Optional Playwright browser channel (e.g. {@code chrome}, {@code msedge}).

properties.name: app.scraping.cookie-string
properties.description: 事前ログイン済み Cookie セット（任意）。空文字の場合は利用しない。

properties.name: app.scraping.csv-with-bom
properties.description: Prepend UTF-8 BOM when writing CSV (Excel compatibility).

properties.name: app.scraping.data-csv-path
properties.description: CSV file containing a column named {@code url}. Defaults to ../data/urls.csv.

properties.name: app.scraping.dataset-label
properties.description: Explicit dataset label (fallback to inference when blank).

properties.name: app.scraping.enable-browser-login
properties.description: Allow interactive Playwright login to bootstrap storage state.

properties.name: app.scraping.enabled
properties.description: スクレイピング機能の有効 / 無効（既定 true）

properties.name: app.scraping.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the scraping runner entirely.

properties.name: app.scraping.headless
properties.description: ヘッドレスモードで起動するか（既定 true）

properties.name: app.scraping.headless
properties.description: Launch Playwright in headless mode (default false to allow first-run login).

properties.name: app.scraping.locale
properties.description: 既定ロケール（既定 ja-JP）

properties.name: app.scraping.out-dir
properties.description: Output directory (relative or absolute path).

properties.name: app.scraping.out-format
properties.description: Output format: ndjson|json|csv.

properties.name: app.scraping.out-per-product
properties.description: Write one file per ASIN (true) or append per dataset (false).

properties.name: app.scraping.storage-state-path
properties.description: Destination of the Playwright storageState JSON that keeps the Amazon session.

properties.name: app.scraping.write-no-reviews
properties.description: Emit empty files even when scrape returns zero reviews.

properties.name: intake.review.dirs
properties.description: Comma separated list of directories that contain review NDJSON files.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.email
properties.description: Amazon login email. Optional; required only when enableBrowserLogin=true.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.enable-browser-login
properties.description: Enable Playwright fallback when HTTP scraping hits the Amazon sign-in wall.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.headless
properties.description: Launch Playwright in headless mode.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.password
properties.description: Amazon login password. Optional; required only when enableBrowserLogin=true.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.reviews-base
properties.description: Base URL used to construct review pages.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.storage-state-path
properties.description: Path to the Playwright storage state JSON that stores authenticated cookies.

properties.name: scraping.amazon.timeout-ms
properties.description: Default timeout in milliseconds for Playwright interactions.
